Package com.example.networkmeup.domain

Class Employer

java.lang.Object
com.example.networkmeup.domain.Employer
public class Employer extends Object
The Employer class represents an entity or company seeking employees for jobs, containing company details and job listings.

  • Constructor Details

    • Employer

      public Employer(Email email, Phone phone, Password password, TIN tin)
      Constructor to create an Employer object with email, phone, password, and TIN. Initializes the jobs list for the employer.
      Parameters:
      email - The employer's email.
      phone - The employer's phone number.
      password - The employer's password.
      tin - The Tax Identification Number (TIN) for the company.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
